item.description:
Waltz & Cha-Cha Class

Would you like to be able to glide down the floor, look good at parties, get in shape and have fun? Then get off the couch and come to
Let's Dance in Rhythm in Branford.

This is a 45 minute class for beginners bring clean, comfortable shoes; a partner helps too.

Class meetings: Tuesdays, 7:15-8pm
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the front desk and say hello to Sherri, my receptionist.
item.why: For your New Years resolutions: It's great exercise, you'll meet other friendly people, it's a good reason to get out of the house, it's better than just watching it on TV, learning to ballroom dance means you will look good at parties and weddings.
item.name: Branford Ballroom Meetup
